Package GameParts

Class Variable

java.lang.Object
GameParts.Variable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Heccable
public class Variable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Heccable
This class is to be used to keep track of individual variables defined in the metadata

    • getInlineComment

      private java.lang.String getInlineComment​(java.lang.String rawData)
      Extracts the comment from the raw data
      Parameters:
      rawData - the raw data
      Returns:
      The comment from the raw data (everything between a // and the end of the line). returns empty string if no comment is found.
